languages.text: "Камень душ — священная защита детей Азуриана. Оберег от взглядов и власти Той, Что Жаждет. Но он заменим. И точно не является моей настоящей душой".

"The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the Children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of She Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And, of course, it is not my actual soul."
languages.original_text: "Камень душ — священная защита детей Азуриана. Оберег от взглядов и власти Той, Что Жаждет. Но он заменим. И точно не является моей настоящей душой".

traits.locale_text: "The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of Her Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And it surely isn't my true soul."
"The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of Her Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And it surely isn't my true soul."

"The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the Children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of She Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And, of course, it is not my actual soul."

"The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the Children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of She Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And, of course, it is not my actual soul."

"The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the Children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of She Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And, of course, it is not my actual soul."

languages.text: “灵魂石是阿苏焉之子的神圣护符，它可以抵御邪恶的垂涎与饥渴女士的魔爪。然而，灵魂石并非无可替代，而且它也并不是我真正的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the Children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of She Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And, of course, it is not my actual soul."

traits.locale_text: “灵魂石是阿苏焉之子的神圣护符，它可以抵御邪恶的垂涎与饥渴女士的魔爪。然而，灵魂石并非无可替代，而且它也并不是我真正的灵魂。”

languages.text: «La joya espiritual es un instrumento de protección sagrada para los hijos de Asuryan. Un talismán que ahuyenta la pérfida mirada y el control de la Sedienta. Pero puede sustituirse. Y como podrás imaginar, no es mi verdadera alma».
languages.original_text: "The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the Children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of She Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And, of course, it is not my actual soul."

traits.locale_text: «La joya espiritual es un instrumento de protección sagrada para los hijos de Asuryan. Un talismán que ahuyenta la pérfida mirada y el control de la Sedienta. Pero puede sustituirse. Y como podrás imaginar, no es mi verdadera alma».

languages.text: « La pierre-esprit est une protection sacrée pour les enfants d'Asuryan, un talisman qui nous protège du regard et du contrôle malsains de l'Assoiffée, mais elle reste remplaçable. Et bien sûr, elle ne constitue pas mon âme. »
languages.original_text: "The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the Children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of She Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And, of course, it is not my actual soul."

traits.locale_text: « La pierre-esprit est une protection sacrée pour les enfants d'Asuryan, un talisman qui nous protège du regard et du contrôle malsains de l'Assoiffée, mais elle reste remplaçable. Et bien sûr, elle ne constitue pas mon âme. »

languages.text: "Der Seelenstein ist der heilige Schutz der Kinder von Asuryan. Ein Talisman, um den bösen Blick und die Kontrolle durch Sie, die dürstet, abzuwehren. Aber er ist ersetzbar. Und natürlich ist er nicht meine eigentliche Seele."
languages.original_text: "The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the Children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of She Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And, of course, it is not my actual soul."

traits.locale_text: "Der Seelenstein ist der heilige Schutz der Kinder von Asuryan. Ein Talisman, um den bösen Blick und die Kontrolle durch Sie, die dürstet, abzuwehren. Aber er ist ersetzbar. Und natürlich ist er nicht meine eigentliche Seele."

languages.text: 「魂縛石はアシュリアンの御子らの神聖な護符である。邪悪な視線と〈かの渇きたる女〉の支配を追い払うお守りだ。しかし、それは取り替えることができる。そしてもちろん、それは私の実際の魂ではない」
languages.original_text: "The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the Children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of She Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And, of course, it is not my actual soul."

traits.locale_text: 「魂縛石はアシュリアンの御子らの神聖な護符である。邪悪な視線と〈かの渇きたる女〉の支配を追い払うお守りだ。しかし、それは取り替えることができる。そしてもちろん、それは私の実際の魂ではない」

languages.original_text: "The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the Children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of She Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And, of course, it is not my actual soul."

languages.text: "Ruh taşı, Asuryan'ın Çocuklarının kutsal korumasıdır. Kem gözleri uzak tutmak ve Susayan'ı kontrol etmeye yarayan bir tılsımdır. Değiştirilebilen bir şey ve tabii ki asıl ruhum değil."
languages.original_text: "The spirit stone is the sacred protection of the Children of Asuryan. A talisman to ward off the evil gaze and control of She Who Thirsts. But it is replaceable. And, of course, it is not my actual soul."

traits.locale_text: "Ruh taşı, Asuryan'ın Çocuklarının kutsal korumasıdır. Kem gözleri uzak tutmak ve Susayan'ı kontrol etmeye yarayan bir tılsımdır. Değiştirilebilen bir şey ve tabii ki asıl ruhum değil."
